experience.description: Developer for first version Lending Club Investor App. This was my first experience with fintech apps. I was involved in the whole process from design to implementation of app architecture.
Android developer in charge of implementing new functionalities and libs related to Analytics Tracking, Ads, Dependency Injection among others.

Here I maintained and developed new modules for Odigeo apps. I learned about VCS, team and time management, rules of good code and architectural patterns. I worked remotely with people from different countries and my performance helped my team to reach goals continuously.
I worked on an internal Android App to make the process of gathering information for marketing campaigns easier and faster. Among others, I built a chat module to communicate app users.

projects.description: I started working in this project from the scratch, implementing a new design on mobile Android App. Both my knowledge on platform and programming skills helped to get the project on record time.
